entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
